enrollday_all.name: course_id
enrollday_all.description: course ID in the standard format as org/number/semester

enrollday_all.name: time
enrollday_all.description: Timestamp indicating when the enrollment event took place

enrollday_all.name: user_id
enrollday_all.description: A numeric ID of the learner on the edX platform

enrollday_all.name: diff_enrollment_honor
enrollday_all.description: Indicator for whether the enrollment event was an honor enrollment. 1 means that the user is honor enrolled; -1 means that the user unenrolled from honor; 0 means the user neither enrolled in honor, not did they ever unenroll from honor

enrollday_all.name: diff_enrollment_verified
enrollday_all.description: Indicator for whether the enrollment event was an verified enrollment. 1 means that the user is verified enrolled; -1 means that the user unenrolled from verified; 0 means the user neither enrolled in verified, not did they ever unenroll from verified

enrollday_all.name: diff_enrollment_audit
enrollday_all.description: Indicator for whether the enrollment event was an audit enrollment. 1 means that the user is audit enrolled; -1 means that the user unenrolled from audit; 0 means the user neither enrolled in audit, not did they ever unenroll from audit

description: Table generated with SQL query file enrollday_all.sql using the simeon CLI tool. It tracks the enrollment events made by a learner
